<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mask instruction is available only from v66</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!HST.hasV66Ops())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The mask instruction available in v66 can be used to generate values in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// registers using 2 immediates Eg. to form 134217724 in R0, you would write</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &quot;R0 = mask(#25,#2)&quot; Since it is a single-word instruction, it takes less</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// code size than a constant-extended transfer at Os</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">  replaceConstExtTransferImmWithMask(MF);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace llvm</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                         Public Constructor Functions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"></CodeLine>
